name: telsia
description: Build scripts for the Telsia browser extension.

scripts.clean: echo "Cleaning Builds and Release folders..." && npx rimraf Builds Release
scripts.build:base:chrome: echo "Copying base files for Chrome..." && npx cpx2 "Source/**/*" Builds/chrome --ignore "Source/manifest*.json,Source/content*.js"
scripts.build:manifest:chrome: echo "Copying Chrome manifest..." && npx cpy-cli Source/manifest.chrome.json Builds/chrome --rename manifest.json --flat
scripts.build:content:chrome: echo "Copying Chrome content script..." && npx cpy-cli Source/content.chrome.js Builds/chrome --rename content.js --flat
scripts.update:version:chrome: echo "Updating Chrome manifest version..." && node scripts/update-manifest-version.mjs Builds/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build:chrome: echo "Building Chrome version..." && npm run build:base:chrome && npm run build:manifest:chrome && npm run build:content:chrome && npm run update:version:chrome
scripts.build:base:firefox: echo "Copying base files for Firefox..." && npx cpx2 "Source/**/*" Builds/firefox --ignore "Source/manifest*.json,Source/content*.js"
scripts.build:manifest:firefox: echo "Copying Firefox manifest..." && npx cpy-cli Source/manifest.firefox.json Builds/firefox --rename manifest.json --flat
scripts.build:content:firefox: echo "Copying Firefox content script..." && npx cpy-cli Source/content.firefox.js Builds/firefox --rename content.js --flat
scripts.update:version:firefox: echo "Updating Firefox manifest version..." && node scripts/update-manifest-version.mjs Builds/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: echo "Building Firefox version..." && npm run build:base:firefox && npm run build:manifest:firefox && npm run build:content:firefox && npm run update:version:firefox
scripts.build: echo "Starting full build..." && npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && echo "Builds complete."
scripts.package:chrome: echo "Packaging Chrome version..." && node package.mjs Builds/chrome Release/telsia-chrome
scripts.package:firefox: echo "Packaging Firefox version..." && node package.mjs Builds/firefox Release/telsia-firefox
scripts.package: echo "Starting full package process..." && npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox && echo "All packages created in Release folder."
